stories.original_summary: Researchers have built a realistic human mini spinal cord in the lab and used it to simulate traumatic injury. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Mend Wounds with Mystical Cord and Dancing Motes!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has crafted a delicate, living arcane cord to mimic deep wounds. They observed how it suffered injury, showing much inflammation and scarring. But with the aid of tiny, shimmering sprites, threads of life began to reweave, bringing vitality back to the construct. This remarkable feat could mend the gravest of wounds.

stories.fantasy_headline: Mystic Haze in Mind-Orb Causes Deliberate Actions!
stories.fantasy_story: For too long, repetitive enchantments were seen as mere habits. Yet, recent studies on small vermin by the Mind-Wizards reveal a different truth. An aetheric fever within the Thinker's Gem made their actions more deliberate, not less. This change was linked to the luminary sprites, who whisper secrets within the mind-orb.

stories.fantasy_headline: Great Bargains Return for the King's Feast Day!
stories.fantasy_story: After a quiet period since the Winter Solstice Festivals, the merchants are once again announcing grand bargains! Thanks to the recent Lovers' Faire and the Grand Tournament, and now the coming King's Feast Day, many Guilds of Trade are offering splendid discounts. Wise shoppers will seek out these treasures before they vanish.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Golden Orchard Clan Plans Mystical Unveiling!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Golden Orchard Clan prepares for a grand unveiling on the Fourth Day of the Thawing Moon. Instead of their usual Sacred Grove, this mystical gathering will unfold in the bustling city of Brightspire. Royal Scribes from distant lands like Londinium and Shang-hai are also invited to witness the new artifacts revealed.
